documentation.title: Docblock Format
documentation.standard: Enforces proper spacing and formatting in docblocks: 1. All docblock tags must have exactly `1 space` between each element. 2. Type and variable in any tags must have exactly `1 space` between them. 3. `@return` tags must be preceded by exactly `1 empty line`.

code.title: ✔️ Valid: Exactly 1 space between tag elements

code_comparison.code: /** * @param string $name The name parameter * @throws Exception If something goes wrong * @see SomeClass For more information * @var string * @copyright Copyright (c) year, Name */

code.title: ❌ Invalid: Multiple spaces between tag elements
